41.eng-name: The Book of al-Fara' and al-'Atirah

hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Abdullah bin 'Ukaim said:"The letter of the Messenger of Allah was read to us when I was a young boy: 'Do not make use of the skins and sinew of dead animals

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُدْبَغُ بِهِ جُلُودُ الْمَيْتَةِ
chapter.eng-name: With What The Skin Of A Dead Animal Is Tanned
